dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 72 IH: Relating to a national emergency by the President on February 1, 2025.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meeks (for himself, Mr. Neal, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Stanton, and Mr. Castro of Texas) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: Relating to a national emergency by the President on February 1, 2025.

section.text: That pursuant to section 202 of the National Emergencies Act (50 U.S.C. 1622), the national emergency declared by the finding of the President on February 1, 2025, in Executive Order 14193 (25 Fed. Reg. 02406), is hereby terminated.
